start.text: To glorious battle! Uh- be careful, everyone.
For the glory of our cause!
Fleet, enter formation. I don't want to lose any of our lives or hulls.
Form up, everyone. Comms officer, get ready to relay orders.

start_boss.text: I- oh, stars... We can't lose our nerve...
This is it. Death or glory. We'll slay them.

retreat.text: I-I take full responsibility! Helmsman, get us out!
We did all we could. Ship in full retreat.

out_of_missiles.text: No ammo left! I think we've still got this.
Oh, no... We're out of missiles.

engaged.text: We meet the enemy in battle!
We're engaging. Everyone, stick to your formations.

need_help.text: They're stronger than we thought. We'll hold.
We're in trouble! Engineering teams, keep an eye on the flux!

running.text: Eep- we need to pull back!

hull_90.text: Wah! I felt that all the way from the bridge!

hull_50.text: T-the hull! The ship is coming apart!
Grh... They'll pay for that! We'll make it!
I'll save you all, I swear!

hull_30.text: All crew to sealed compartments! I won't lose you!
Ship is in critical condition! We might not make it...
No! We need to hang in there..!
*Clang!* Gyah! A chunk of the bridge just hit my helmet!

overload.text: Overload! Engineering teams, we're relying on you!
Woah! Almost fried myself on a conduit!

death.text: No... NO!! I never wanted to lose any of you!
Uugh... The fleet can't break, not now...

victory.text: That's it! Once the rush dies down, get ready to repair your hulls.
We've done it, we've defeated them!
Victory! I hope they had enough spare parts to keep us going...
Bridge crew, drinks are on me the next time we make port!

victory_boss.text: Bust out the reserves! This calls for a celebration!
